channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Where Jim Cramer stands on Apple after more selling from Warren Buffett's Berkshire
item.description: Berkshire sold another chunk of Apple stock, cutting its stake by about 25% during the third quarter.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Snap Losing Streak
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures settled higher for the first time in four sessions, with the market still looking for colder winter weather to lift demand.

item.title: Coterra Energy posted a mixed quarter, but delivered beats where it matters most
item.description: Once again, management's strict adherence to cost discipline meant strong earnings and free cash flow generation.

item.title: Stocks, Treasury Yields Fall Ahead of Tuesday's Vote
item.description: The dollar weakens and oil prices jump as investors scrutinize ‘Trump trades.’

item.title: Exxon beats earnings estimates, increases fourth-quarter dividend
item.description: Exxon's stock rose in early trading after beating earnings expectations.

item.title: Amazon shares pop on earnings beat, cloud growth
item.description: The company's cloud and advertising units showed strong growth.

item.title: Gold Slides Ahead of Election Day
item.description: Front-month gold futures fell 0.1%, the second drop in three sessions. Futures have been inching lower ahead of tomorrow’s election, but in general tr...

item.title: Dollar Weakens as Markets Seem to Price Out Tariff Risk
item.description: The dollar fell ahead of the U.S. presidential election, with expectations regarding trade tariffs likely moving FX markets, Goldman Sachs economists ...

item.title: U.S. Stocks, Treasury Yields Fall Ahead of Tuesday's Vote
item.description: U.S. stock indexes edged down with elements of the so-called Trump trade appearing to falter ahead of Tuesday’s election.

item.title: Amazon shares jump 6% after earnings beat
item.description: Amazon's latest upbeat results were driven by growth in cloud and digital advertising.
